BIBLIOGRAPHY
ABS (Australian Bureau of Statistics) (2004), Disability, Ageing and Carers: Summary of Findings,
Australia, 2003, Cat. No. 4430.0, ABS, Canberra.

Health, Washington DC.

London.

1994-1999 " , Health Statistics Quarterly, No. 25, pp. 18–27.

Judge, K., et al. (2006), Health Inequalities: a Challenge for Europe, UK Presidency of the European
